'''Caras Galadhon''' can refer to:

==Middle-earth==
*'''[[Caras Galadhon]]''', the city and fortress of the [[Galadhrim]] of [[Lothlórien]].

==Adaptations==
*"[[Caras Galadhon (scene)|Caras Galadhon]]", a scene from the [[2001]] film ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''.
*"[[Caras Galadhon (soundtrack)|Caras Galadhon]]", a track from the [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - The Complete Recordings|soundtrack]] for the film ''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring''.
